content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam engine at position (52.5, 51.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position 52.5, 51.5) - Currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.
- Pipe group (position 49.5, 46.5) - Working status.
- Electricity group (position 51.8333, 51.1667) - Not plugged into the electric network.

### Electric poles
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 50.5, 50.5)
- Small electric pole (position 50.5, 51.5)
- Small electric pole (position 54.5, 51.5)
- Small electric pole (position 52.5, 54.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to steam engine connection
- Ensure that the steam engine is properly connected to a power network. Check for nearby electric poles and ensure they are functional.

### Errors when inserting items into steam engine
- Verify that the steam engine has available space and accepts the item type before attempting to insert coal.

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure that the target position for placing an electric pole is clear of existing entities. Remove any obstructing entities before placing the pole.

### Errors related to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before use. Double-check the naming of variables to avoid NameErrors.
